column4: ok, BIG TIME rookie mistake.  I accidently removed the firefox dir under /opt
After your done laughing, can some please tell me how I reinstall firefox
like you did the first time :)
did you install firefox 1.5 before following the wiki
Yes, but I've been trying to track down an issue and consequently screwing everything up
you probably used dpkg-divert in the process
it just gets worse and worse.  not a good day in whoville
so the firefox executable is renamed
sudo dpkg-divert --remove /usr/bin/firefox will get it back
i'll try that,... thanks for now.
i got the following:  Removing `local diversion of /usr/bin/firefox to /usr/bin/firefox.ubuntu'
it's should be a broken symlink
done.  then should i reinstall via synaptic b4 i use the wiki to get 1.5?
see if it works now. if not reinstall it
